verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ

translations.text: O you wrapped ˹in your clothes˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya ayyuha almuzzammil
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا

translations.text: Stand all night ˹in prayer˺ except a little—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qumi allayla illa qaleela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا

translations.text: ˹pray˺ half the night, or a little less,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Nisfahu awi onqus minhu qaleela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا

translations.text: or a little more—and recite the Quran ˹properly˺ in a measured way.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aw zid AAalayhi warattili alqur-anatarteela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا

translations.text: ˹For˺ We will soon send upon you a weighty revelation.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna sanulqee AAalayka qawlan thaqeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا

translations.text: Indeed, worship in the night is more impactful and suitable for recitation.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna nashi-ata allayli hiya ashaddu wat-anwaaqwamu qeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا

translations.text: For during the day you are over-occupied ˹with worldly duties˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna laka fee annahari sabhantaweela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا

translations.text: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkuri isma rabbikawatabattal ilayhi tabteela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا

translations.text: ˹He is the˺ Lord of the east and the west. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him, so take Him ˹alone˺ as a Trustee of Affairs.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbu almashriqi walmaghribi lailaha illa huwa fattakhithhu wakeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا

translations.text: Be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say, and depart from them courteously.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wasbir AAala mayaqooloona wahjurhum hajran jameela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا

translations.text: And leave to Me the deniers—the people of luxury—and bear with them for a little while.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watharnee walmukaththibeenaolee annaAAmati wamahhilhum qaleela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا

translations.text: ˹For˺ We certainly have shackles, a ˹raging˺ Fire,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna ladayna ankalan wajaheema
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

translations.text: choking food, and a painful punishment ˹in store for them˺
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WataAAaman tha ghussatinwaAAathaban aleema
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا

translations.text: on the Day the earth and mountains will shake ˹violently˺, and mountains will be ˹reduced to˺ dunes of shifting sand.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma tarjufu al-ardu waljibaluwakanati aljibalu katheeban maheela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَـٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا

translations.text: Indeed, We have sent to you a messenger as a witness over you, just as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna arsalna ilaykum rasoolanshahidan AAalaykum kama arsalna ilafirAAawna rasoola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا

translations.text: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a stern grip.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaAAasa firAAawnu arrasoolafaakhathnahu akhthan wabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا

translations.text: If you ˹pagans˺ persist in disbelief, then how will you guard yourselves against ˹the horrors of˺ a Day which will turn children’s hair grey?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakayfa tattaqoona in kafartum yawmanyajAAalu alwildana sheeba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا

translations.text: It will ˹even˺ cause the sky to split apart. His promise ˹of judgment˺ must be fulfilled.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Assamao munfatirunbihi kana waAAduhu mafAAoola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

translations.text: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hathihi tathkiratun famanshaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌۢ

translations.text: Surely your Lord knows that you ˹O Prophet˺ stand ˹in prayer˺ for nearly two-thirds of the night, or ˹sometimes˺ half of it, or a third, as do some of those with you. Allah ˹alone˺ keeps a ˹precise˺ measure of the day and night. He knows that you ˹believers˺ are unable to endure this, and has turned to you in mercy.<sup foot_note=77561>1</sup> So recite ˹in prayer˺ whatever you can from the Quran. He knows that some of you will be sick, some will be travelling throughout the land seeking Allah’s bounty, and some fighting in the cause of Allah. So recite whatever you can from it. And ˹continue to˺ perform ˹regular˺ prayers, pay alms-tax, and lend to Allah a good loan.<sup foot_note=77562>2</sup> Whatever good you send forth for yourselves, you will find it with Allah far better and more rewarding.<sup foot_note=77563>3</sup> And seek Allah’s forgiveness. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna rabbaka yaAAlamu annaka taqoomu adnamin thuluthayi allayli wanisfahu wathuluthahu wata-ifatunmina allatheena maAAaka wallahu yuqaddiruallayla wannahara AAalima an lan tuhsoohufataba AAalaykum faqraoo ma tayassara minaalqur-ani AAalima an sayakoonu minkum marda waakharoonayadriboona fee al-ardi yabtaghoona min fadliAllahi waakharoona yuqatiloona fee sabeeliAllahi faqraoo ma tayassara minhu waaqeemooassalata waatoo azzakatawaaqridoo Allaha qardan hasanan wamatuqaddimoo li-anfusikum min khayrin tajidoohu AAinda Allahihuwa khayran waaAAthama ajran wastaghfirooAllaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
